items.title: More than 200 S&P 500 companies scrubbed 'diversity' and 'equity' from annual reports in 2025
items.description: More than 200 S&P 500 companies scrubbed words such as 'diversity' and 'equity' from their annual reports in 2025, according to a new report from Freshfields, reinforcing a widening corporate retreat from DEI.

items.title: SHAREHOLDER REMINDER: Faruqi & Faruqi, LLP Investigates Claims on Behalf of Investors of Krispy Kreme
items.author: Faruqi & Faruqi, Llp
items.description: Faruqi & Faruqi is investigating potential securities law violations by Krispy Kreme related to its McDonald's partnership, with allegations of misleading statements about product demand and partnership profitability.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Company reported a 15.3% revenue decline, a significant net loss increase, and is reassessing its McDonald's deployment schedule, indicating substantial business challenges
Mentioned as a partnership that is being reevaluated, with potential performance issues in the partnership
